reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Humanitarian assistance to UNHCR's operations in Iraq

description.narrative: There are currently 26 million IDPs in Iraq fleeing the conflict ongoing since 2014. The fight against ISIL increased the number of persons in need of humanitarian assistance to 87 million. The UNHCR's operation in Iraq focuses on the protection of the ref ugees and the IDPs shelter provision and related coordination as well as distribution of relief items. In 2018 UNHCR's response will also assist IDP returns and advance a transition from humanitarian interventions to more development-oriented programmes. U NHCR's requirements for the Iraq operation amount to 560 million USD.
